39 class CollisionPrimitive
40 {
41 public:
47 friend class IntersectionTests;
48 friend class CollisionDetector;
49
53 RigidBody * body;
54
58 Matrix4 offset;
59
63 void calculateInternals();
64
69 Vector3 getAxis(unsigned index) const
70 {
71 return transform.getAxisVector(index);
72 }
73
80 const Matrix4& getTransform() const
81 {
82 return transform;
83 }
84
85
86 protected:
92 Matrix4 transform;
93 };

150 const CollisionSphere &sphere,
151 const CollisionPlane &plane);

183 struct CollisionData
184 {
191 Contact *contactArray;
192
194 Contact *contacts;
195
197 int contactsLeft;
198
200 unsigned contactCount;
201
203 real friction;
204
206 real restitution;
207
212 real tolerance;
213
218 bool hasMoreContacts()
219 {
220 return contactsLeft > 0;
221 }
222
226 void reset(unsigned maxContacts)
227 {
228 contactsLeft = maxContacts;
229 contactCount = 0;
230 contacts = contactArray;
231 }
232
237 void addContacts(unsigned count)
238 {
239 // Reduce the number of contacts remaining, add number used
240 contactsLeft -= count;
241 contactCount += count;
242
243 // Move the array forward
244 contacts += count;
245 }
246 };
247
